name: file-wizard
description: Filewizard is a lightweight web application for file management, supporting directory navigation, uploads and sharing. It has a minimal UI and can be deployed quickly using Docker for self-hosted scenarios and local personal file sharing.
features: File Management: Lightweight web file manager, Directory navigation, Upload and sharing. Simple personal file access.
Minimal UI: Clean and fast. No bloat.
Local Sharing: Perfect for personal use. Private file management.
Upload Support: Drag-and-drop files. Easy transfers.
Download: Retrieve files quickly. Simple access.
Folder Browsing: Navigate directories. Organized structure.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage. Efficient operation.
Self-Hosted: Keep files private. Full control.
